terra.name: Terra
terra.description:
User performs a critical attack that ignores Terrain effects.
Can miss.
Can't activate with Adept, Draco or Astra.

Sol.name: Sol
Sol.description:
User restores HP equal to damage dealt.
Can miss (needs verification).

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description:
As HP decreases, Crit increases.
Bonus: 100×(1-HP/Max HP)

astra.name: Astra
astra.description:
User performs a 5-hit attack if using a physical melee weapon.
Can't activate with Adept, Draco or Terra.

luna.name: Luna
luna.description:
User negates foe's defence/magical defense.
Still damages shields (needs verification).

vantage.name: Vantage
vantage.activation: Unit Attack Speed > Foe Attack Speed

lethality.name: Lethality
lethality.description: User kills foe if using a physical melee weapon and if a critical hit would kill.

adept.name: Adept
adept.description:
User performs a 2-hit attack.
Can't activate with Draco, Terra or Astra.

draco.name: Draco
draco.description:
User triples attack if using a physical melee weapon as an infantry unit.
Can't activate with Adept, Terra or Astra.

pavise.name: Pavise
pavise.description: User reduces physical damage taken by 20.

mug.name: Mug
mug.description:
User steals all non ☆ weapons and items from defeated foe.
Reduces Hit and Avoid of allies within 3 spaces by 50.

steal.name: Steal
steal.description: User steals a non ☆ weapon or item from foe after combat. User does not need to hit foe during combat.

canto.name: Canto
canto.description: User can use left over move after attacking. Only usable by mounted units.

flurry.name: Flurry
flurry.description: User gains the Flurry command. Initiates 2~5 rounds of combat.
flurry.activation: Unit Attack Speed > Foe Attack Speed

dance.name: Dance
dance.description:
User allows an ally to move again, excludes Dragons.
Cycles between 7 states when used and starts at 0.
State 2 can grant Ensorcel, State 4 can grant Enarmor, State 6 can grant Empower. 
Chances for effects are (Times danced{max 250} - 150)/10

sing.name: Sing
sing.description:
User restores HP of allies and may make them move again.
S = Times sang so far (max 250)
HP restored = (S + 5)/50, min 2
Range = (Level/5) +1, max 4
Refresh chance = (S / 50) + 2* (Recieved Support/5) + 10, excludes Plum and Dragons

warp.name: Warp
warp.description: User can teleport to a traversable space and act afterwards.

summon.name: Summon
summon.description:
User can use special summoning staves.
Range of summoned units: 1~5
Number of summoned units: Story Mode: 2+(Mag/5), Versus Mode: 1+(Mag/10). Max 20
Chance for rare summons: Story Mode: 10%, Versus Mode: Lv%
Summons Level: Unit Level +/-2

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: User can open doors and chests without keys.

slayer.name: Slayer
slayer.description: User gains +20 Hit, Avoid, Crit and Crit Avoid against monsters.

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description: Grants allies within 3 squares +5% Hit and Avoid.

forester.name: Forester
forester.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Forest maps.

grassrunner.name: Grassrunner
grassrunner.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Grass maps.

mountaineer.name: Mountaineer
mountaineer.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Mountain maps.

seafarer.name: Seafarer
seafarer.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Sea maps.

frontiersman.name: Frontiersman
frontiersman.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Frontier maps. Also take no damage from swamp terrain.

urbanite.name: Urbanite
urbanite.description: Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Castle and Indoor maps.

gladiator.name: Gladiator
gladiator.description: Unit gains +20% Hit and Avoid in Arenas. Unit gains +10% Hit and Avoid and +1 Move on Versus Mode Arena maps.

imitate.name: Imitate
imitate.description:
Transforms into an adjacent unit.
MaxHP = (Target MaxHP - Narcus MaxHP) /2 + Narcus MaxHP
Other stats = Narcus stats - Thief class bases + target class bases
